summary: A collection of asynchronous pytest cases that exercise the Litellm proxy's parallel request limiter, checking correct handling of concurrency caps, token‑per‑minute and request‑per‑minute quotas, model‑specific and team/user limits, as well as the execution of pre‑call and post‑call hooks under both normal and failure conditions, including streaming requests.
business_intent: Validate that the API gateway enforces configured rate‑limiting and concurrency controls to protect downstream language model services, ensure fair usage across users and teams, and guarantee reliable hook behavior.
